name: dom7
description: Minimalistic JavaScript library for DOM manipulation, with a jQuery-compatible API

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp demo && gulp server
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp demo && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp server
